poem:
### Questions from Wilma and Isla

Wilma wonders about the stones,  
a circle of mystery, 85 unknowns.  
Meanwhile, Isla imagines height,  
centimeters stacking to the night.  

Innocence dances with ancient lore,  
as children's questions open the door—  
a world where facts meet endless why,  
a dance of stones beneath the sky.
